resources.string: Manila is the capital of Philippines.
The Pacific Ocean is larger than the Atlantic Ocean.
Asia is the Biggest continent in the world.
Pyramids of Giza is located in China.
The Nile River is the longest river in the world.
Tokyo is the capital of Japan.
The Sahara Desert is the largest hot desert in the world.
Mount Everest is located in the Andes mountain range.
Venus is the closest planet to the Sun.
The Great Barrier Reef is located off the coast of Australia.
